name: Snow Fall
description:
Incredible evil has attacked your world. Destroyer of the worlds that absorbs whole galaxies. There is only one way out - this is to stand up for protection and destroy the "Destroyer of the Worlds."

LEVELS
18 fascinating levels that include 5 biomes. Remember - every biome is a style of passing the game and environment. With each level your skill will increase more and more. In the final level, you have to fight with the main villain - Destroyer of the Worlds.

CRAFT AND WEAPON
Collect elements on the levels and create a unique weapon. But remember, if you die, that weapon will disappear.

Craft elements:
Metal x3 = chip
Chip x3 = Charge
Crystal x3 = Shard

Craft weapon:
Metal + metal + chip = rifle
Metal + wood + gear = automatic rifle
Metal + gear + board = machine gun
Crystal + board + gear = laser rifle
Shard + board + pinion = laser machine gun

MANAGEMENT b>
Full joystick support and keyboard control. Do not forget about learning the game, when you first start the level. Key ASD for aim, reload and shoot,arrow buttons for move.

FEATURES: b>
❄ 8 bit graphics
❄ Platform
❄ Pixel Game
❄ Retro game
